name: LFOvars
All voices share the same two LFOs
LFOSources constructor
comment:
updateLFO1();
updateLFO2();

name: LFOcode
Voicevars
Voice constructor
A voice has two Osc, Noise and Wavetable.
Each Osc are modulated by two external LFO.
Each voice has it's own ADSR so can be at a unique position in start/stop playing.
Voicecode
Single filter and chorus for all voices
Filtervars
FilterEffects constructor
Filtercode
Arpvars
Can feed note (sequences) in place of input Note Handling
Arpeggiator constructor
Arpcode
Receives MIDI CC messages and directs to the right places
CC constructor
comment:
usbMIDI.setHandleControlChange(OnControlChange);
MIDI.setHandleControlChange(OnControlChange);

name: CCcode
Subscribes to MIDI PB and adjust oscillators
PitchBend constructor
comment:
usbMIDI.setHandlePitchChange(onPitchChange);
MIDI.setHandlePitchBend(onPitchChange);

name: PBcode
Subscribes and receives MIDI note on/off and passes on to oscillators
NoteHandler constructor
Notecode
Subscribes to MIDI Prog Change and sets wavetable
ProgChange constructor
comment:
usbMIDI.setHandleProgramChange(onProgramChange);
MIDI.setHandleProgramChange(onProgramChange);

name: ProgChangecode
Synthvars
Core engine of synth that ties LFOs, Oscs and Filter
Synthcode

phatBass code

#ifndef _DEFINES_H_
#define _DEFINES_H_

#define NUM_VOICES  8

#define LED_PIN 13
#define TFT_DC  9
#define TFT_CS 10
#define TOUCH_CS 8
#define JOY_SW 2
#define JOY_X 8 // pin 22
#define JOY_Y 5 // pin 19

#define PANEL_H 140
#define BAR_HEIGHT 100
#define BAR_WIDTH 20
#define BAR_OFFSET 15
#define MIX_PANEL_X 10
#define MIX_PANEL_Y 20
#define MIX_PANEL_W 80
#define ADSR_PANEL_X 120
#define ADSR_PANEL_Y 20
#define ADSR_PANEL_W 100
#define KEYB_X  10
#define KEYB_Y  200
#define KEY_WIDTH 12

#define CHORUS_DELAY_LENGTH (32*AUDIO_BLOCK_SAMPLES)

#endif
